languages.text: "Очередной еретик, поправший священные законы Тассеры. И коль тело его уже обращается в прах, такова же и участь его имени — быть развеянным по ветру, дабы более не осквернять ни одних уст нашего священного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Онгольд Йонс, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Гениальнейший мастер пыточных увеселений — когда-то". {n}Не без удовольствия отмечает Урсус.{/n}

languages.text: "Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."
languages.original_text: "Очередной еретик, поправший священные законы Тассеры. И коль тело его уже обращается в прах, такова же и участь его имени — быть развеянным по ветру, дабы более не осквернять ни одних уст нашего священного мира".

traits.locale_text: "Another heretic who has violated the holy laws of Thassera. And since his body is already turning to ashes, such is the fate of his name to be scattered to the winds, so that it defiles the lips on our sacred word no more."

"Another heretic who has violated the holy laws of Thassera. And since his body is already turning to ashes, such is the fate of his name to be scattered to the winds, so that it defiles the lips on our sacred word no more."

"Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

"Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

"Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

languages.text: “不过是又一位违背了塔瑟拉神圣律法的异端分子。他的身体已经化为灰烬，而他的名字也将被风吹散。这样一来，这个邪恶的名字，就再也不会玷污这个神圣世界任何人的喉舌了。”
languages.original_text: "Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

traits.locale_text: “不过是又一位违背了塔瑟拉神圣律法的异端分子。他的身体已经化为灰烬，而他的名字也将被风吹散。这样一来，这个邪恶的名字，就再也不会玷污这个神圣世界任何人的喉舌了。”

languages.text: «Otro hereje que ha violado las sacrosantas leyes de Thassera. Y como su cuerpo ya se está carbonizando, su nombre correrá la misma suerte: será esparcido a los cuatro vientos como ceniza para que nunca vuelva a profanar los labios de ningún habitante de nuestro sagrado planeta».
languages.original_text: "Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

traits.locale_text: «Otro hereje que ha violado las sacrosantas leyes de Thassera. Y como su cuerpo ya se está carbonizando, su nombre correrá la misma suerte: será esparcido a los cuatro vientos como ceniza para que nunca vuelva a profanar los labios de ningún habitante de nuestro sagrado planeta».

languages.text: "Thassera'nın kutsal yasalarını ihlal eden başka bir kâfir. Bedeni çoktan küle döndüğünden adının kaderi de aynı olacak, rüzgârlara savrulacak ki kutsal dünyamızda yaşayan herhangi birinin dudaklarını bir daha asla kirletemesin."
languages.original_text: "Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'nın kutsal yasalarını ihlal eden başka bir kâfir. Bedeni çoktan küle döndüğünden adının kaderi de aynı olacak, rüzgârlara savrulacak ki kutsal dünyamızda yaşayan herhangi birinin dudaklarını bir daha asla kirletemesin."

languages.text: 「タッセーラの神聖な法を犯した異端者です。彼の肉体はすでに灰となりますので、それが彼の名の運命でもあるのでしょう。風に吹かれてばらまかれ、聖なる惑星に生きる私たちの唇を汚すことはもう二度とないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラの神聖な法を犯した異端者です。彼の肉体はすでに灰となりますので、それが彼の名の運命でもあるのでしょう。風に吹かれてばらまかれ、聖なる惑星に生きる私たちの唇を汚すことはもう二度とないでしょう」

languages.text: « Un hérétique parmi tant d'autres qui a enfreint les saintes lois de Thassera. Et, puisque son corps retourne en ce moment même à la poussière, il en ira de même pour son nom, qui sera dispersé aux quatre vents pour qu'il ne puisse plus jamais souiller les lèvres de quiconque a l'honneur d'habiter notre monde sacré. »
languages.original_text: "Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

traits.locale_text: « Un hérétique parmi tant d'autres qui a enfreint les saintes lois de Thassera. Et, puisque son corps retourne en ce moment même à la poussière, il en ira de même pour son nom, qui sera dispersé aux quatre vents pour qu'il ne puisse plus jamais souiller les lèvres de quiconque a l'honneur d'habiter notre monde sacré. »

languages.text: "Ein weiterer Ketzer, der gegen die heiligen Gesetze von Thassera verstößt. Und da sein Körper ohnehin schon zu Asche wird, soll auch sein Name dieses Schicksal teilen. Vom Winde verweht zu werden, auf dass er nie wieder die Lippen irgendeines Menschen schände, der auf unserer heiligen Welt lebt."
languages.original_text: "Another heretic who violated the holy laws of Thassera. And, since his body is already turning to ash, such will be the fate of his name as well — to be scattered to the winds, that it may never again defile the lips of any who live upon our sacred world."

traits.locale_text: "Ein weiterer Ketzer, der gegen die heiligen Gesetze von Thassera verstößt. Und da sein Körper ohnehin schon zu Asche wird, soll auch sein Name dieses Schicksal teilen. Vom Winde verweht zu werden, auf dass er nie wieder die Lippen irgendeines Menschen schände, der auf unserer heiligen Welt lebt."
